alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 3:04AM CST until February 23 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...South Cass, Crow Wing and South Aitkin Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake area. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 PM this afternoon to midnight CST tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Forecast snow amounts may still change. Keep up with the latest forecast and adjust travel plans accordingly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass
